value.summary: Across the four JSON outputs, the content is faithful to the provided report, uses only the quantitative values present in the report table/lines (L28–L33) without inventing new numbers, and maintains appropriate causal caution for the retrospective human analysis (L49–L52). Study design and cohorts are correctly represented (L14–L23), controls and conditional/null results are captured (L36–L39), and the mechanistic chain is consistent with the report’s narrative (L41–L46). Line references used—
